title: Fader Martin
contents: subtitle | Member of the Southern High Council of Myrmidia
property | Description | Determined follower of Myrmidia and mentor to the part
property | Actions| Couragous, compassionate and demanding
property | Weapon | Lance on horseback - Mace on foot
property | Magic equipment | Magic Lance, Magic Mace of shrapnel (leaves spikes in body and regrows new ones)
